DOC.brief_title: Stay Strong : A Physical Activity Program Afghanistan Iraq Veterans
DOC.detailed_description: Veterans Afghanistan Iraq ( OEF/OIF ) high risk become overweight obese . However , exist VA program design young Veterans comfortable technology-mediated intervention , may yet develop obesity-related illness , contain relatively high percentage woman compare previous Veteran cohort . Technology-mediated lifestyle intervention include continuous , objective home monitoring physical activity , automate internet mediate feedback , e-coaching increase physical activity improve weight loss non-Veteran population . When deliver large scale , intervention represent low cost effective alternative face-to-face lifestyle change intervention implement widely VA health care system . Thus , project test feasibility effectiveness prevention focus , internet-mediated healthy lifestyle physical activity program , Stay Strong , tailor need , preference demographic OEF/OIF Veterans . Specifically , Stay Strong relies use wearable device , Fitbit Charge HR , incorporate coach support , tailor message , personalized physical activity goal . Stay Strong compare use Fitbit Charge HR standard online support .
